name.en: Research Project Planning and  Proposal Writing

department.en: Interdisciplinary Program of Earth System Science

goal.en: The objective of this class is to help the students, through the teacher’s instruction and guidance and students’ self-learnings and mutual discussions, to learn how to plan, write and accomplish their own study proposals for their future study on the campus. In order to achieve this goal, aptitude test and counseling will be practiced to help student to realize their own character and personality for their future career development. In addition to the study plan, we hope that this class can help students to find their own main direction of the specialty, even life career direction in the future.
goal.ch: 透過教師講授、導引、與同學自主學習與相互討論，完成專題研究計畫題目、方向與內容的規劃與寫作，希望同學可以找到在大學中學習的方向與主軸，甚至人生方向與定位，對於未來的職涯發展有所助益。

content.en: Outline：Course introduction (1st week); Provision of resources on the campus for student study (2nd – 4th weeks); Invited Seminar (5th week); Research project planning and template description (6th-7th weeks); Research subject determination – Tutor’s comment, suggestion and student’s decision (8th week); Mid-term examination (9th week); Introduction of Proposal writing (10th-12th weeks); oral presentation of research proposal for every student (13th-16th weeks); sentiment sharing and wrap-up discussion (17th week); Final Examination (18th week).
content.ch: 上課第一週將簡介課程大綱與目的；第二週到第四週將介紹大學提供給學生學習的資源，包括大學組織與運作、大學教師的工作與任務、教學課程資源、輔導諮商資源、工讀/實習資源、參與研究計畫/實驗室資源、社會參與/創業資源等；第五週為專題講座，演講內容以認識自己為主軸；第六週到第七週介紹研究計畫範例介紹與研究計畫的規劃；第八週為導師會談紀錄討論與學生研究計畫主軸方向的擬定，準備開始研究計畫的撰寫；第九週為期中考；第十週到第十二週說明研究計畫格式與內容、研究計畫寫作應注意重點等，第十三週到第十六週為研究計畫報告與交流分享；第十七週為期末同儕分享與檢討；第十八週為期末考

grading.en: Proposal writing (30%), Examination (25%), Assignment (20%), Oral presentation (15%), Learning behavior (10%)
grading.ch: 計畫寫作 30%，考試 25%，作業 20%，口頭報告 15%，學習態度 10%
